name: Tag
description: The Tag component is a compact element for displaying discrete information.

props.name: label
props.doc: The label description of the group of tags.

props.name: children
props.doc: The content of the tag can be a string or a React Element.

props.name: className
props.doc: Custom className for the component root.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: text
props.doc: The content of the tag can be a string or a React Element.

props.name: icon
props.doc: To be included in the tag. Primary Icons can be set as a string (e.g. icon="chevron_right"), other icons should be set as React elements. Note, we recommend not to use icons with clickable tags.

props.name: hasLabel
props.doc: If a label is given, typical inside a table or dl (definition list), then you can disable Tag.Group as a dependent of Tag. Use `true` to omit the `Tag group required:` warning.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Possible values are `default`, `clickable`, `addable`, or `removable`. Defaults to `default`.

props.name: omitOnKeyUpDeleteEvent
props.doc: Set to `true` to omit triggering an event when the user releases the `Delete` or `Backspace` keys. Defaults to `false`.

events.name: onClick
events.doc: Will be called on a click event. Returns an object with the native event: `{ event }`.

events.name: onDelete
events.doc: Will be called on a click event. Returns an object with the native event: `{ event }`. This property does not support icon and will be ignored if `onClick`is defined.
